alert.note: Alert for Coastal Jefferson; Lower Lafourche (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 27 at 10:16AM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lafourche and southeastern Jefferson Parishes through 1045 AM CDT... At 1016 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Port Fourchon, or 20 miles south of Galliano, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Leeville, Port Fourchon and Grand Isle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will relay your report to the National Weather Service office in New Orleans.
